tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_management_supplies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_equipment (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  serial_number VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  condition VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  purchased_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE waste_bins (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bin_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  capacity INT NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE waste_pickups (
  pickup_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bin_id INT,
  pickup_date DATE NOT NULL,
  quantity_gathered INT NOT NULL,
  pickup_type ENUM('regular', 'recycling', 'special') NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (bin_id) REFERENCES waste_bins(id)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_inventory (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity_available INT NOT NULL,
  last_maintenance DATE
);

CREATE TABLE WasteSupplies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supply_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    supplier VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE WasteEquipment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE,
    condition VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposalSites (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteLogistics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transport_vehicle VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    driver_name VARCHAR(255),
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE WasteManagementReports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    report_type VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);
